name: Gamer Hell
description:
Greetings,

We would hereby like to inform you that for the sins commited during your life on Earth, you have been admitted to hell. Your sins, nothing short of remarkable, have been identified as worthy of divine punishment. Therefore, you will need to pass a game consisting of an escort mission and a water level. Fun, right?

With kind regards,

Special Punishment Department

Controlls

WASD or Arrow keys. Your companion will follow you everywhere, so be careful not to lead him to any danger.

Tips

You can jump on the AI head and he could jump on your head too.

AI will jump if he is about to fall of the edge and the edge and the fall is for him too big to get back.

AI jumps higher (and falls slower) that you, so you can use this in some puzzles.
